summary:
The Security Council:

Recalling previous resolutions and statements on Somalia, 
Reaffirming respect for Somalia's sovereignty, territorial integrity, and unity, 
Welcoming engagement between Somalia, Jubaland State Government, and the Panel of Experts on charcoal stockpiles in Kismayo,

1. Recalls paragraph 36 of resolution 2662 (2022) and notes the Federal Government of Somalia's proposal to dispose of the charcoal stockpile by export;
2. Authorises Somalia to implement the proposal as a one-off exemption to the ban on charcoal import and export, 
3. Directs the Committee to follow up on the decision and implementation;
4. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
